channel.title: CVE Feed for Calibre -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Calibre -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7009|2024-08-06T13:37:59.031Z -- calibre -- calibre
item.description: Unsanitized user-input in Calibre <= 7.15.0 allow users with permissions to perform full-text searches to achieve SQL injection on the SQLite database.

item.title: CVE-2024-7008|2024-08-06T03:40:01.147Z -- calibre -- calibre
item.description: Unsanitized user-input in Calibre <= 7.15.0 allow attackers to perform reflected cross-site scripting.

item.title: CVE-2024-7009|2024-08-06T03:40:33.075Z -- calibre -- calibre
item.description: Unsanitized user-input in Calibre <= 7.15.0 allow users with permissions to perform full-text searches to achieve SQL injection on the SQLite database.

item.title: CVE-2024-6782|2024-08-06T03:39:20.856Z -- calibre -- calibre
item.description: Improper access control in Calibre 6.9.0 ~ 7.14.0 allow unauthenticated attackers to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-6781|2024-08-06T03:38:45.309Z -- calibre -- calibre
item.description: Path traversal in Calibre <= 7.14.0 allow unauthenticated attackers to achieve arbitrary file read.
